metadata.synopsis: On a Moonless night, the faithful of Shar can show worship by committing an act of depravity in Shar’s name. Shadowheart and the Avatar will engage in some sexual deviancy in order to fulfil this order.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Open origin debug book2. Select Nights3. Select "Act 3 Romance - Shar Path"4. Talk to Shadowheart5. Agree to go with her

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.text: This is the spot. Looks like someone's left poor Selûne untended...
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart a tiny, neglected shrine of Selûne - little more than a statue of the moonmaiden in a quiet, overgrown city courtyard. Shadowheart produces a little bottle/vial full of dark red liquid.

1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

34.speaker: Player
34.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

45.speaker: Shadowheart
45.text: Something of a much rarer vintage. After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: This act of wickedness - it isn't going to hurt anyone, is it?
35.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: Physically? No... that part is already done. This will wound the spirit. Most deeply, I should hope.
6.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

36.speaker: Shadowheart
36.text: After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.
36.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Let's see what comfort we can offer a grieving mother.
2.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Selûne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

39.text: You did well. I hope you're not trying to surpass me in Lady Shar's graces.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: As Shadowheart steps back to admire her work, the player steps forward, smearing the blood around as though finger painting.

23.text: You did well. I hope you're not trying to surpass me in Lady Shar's graces.
23.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The statue of Selûne has been desecrated with the blood of her daughter. Red tears trail from the eyes. Assorted graffiti is dotted all over.

The player looks down from the the statue to their bloodied hand.

Shadowheart appears at the player's side. She's bright-eyed and blood-smeared.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: You did well. I hope you're not trying to surpass me in Lady Shar's graces.
48.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The statue of Selûne has been desecrated with the blood of her daughter. Red tears trail from the eyes. Assorted graffiti is dotted all over.

The player looks down from the the statue to their bloodied hand.

Shadowheart appears at the player's side. She's bright-eyed and blood-smeared.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Not at all. So now we feast?
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Yes. But I'm afraid I forgot to bring any food...
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I thought you had no time for lovers anymore - what does this mean for us?
5.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

17.speaker: Shadowheart
17.text: It means nothing. Shar owns my heart. But luckily she's willing to share the rest of me, just this once.

46.speaker: Player
46.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: That's what makes it so good.
19.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Gods, what I wouldn't give to kiss you right now.
11.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: But whatever you have to give... it's not enough, is it?
43.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

47.speaker: Shadowheart
47.text: A shame. I wanted to show you just how rewarding the embrace of darkness could be... but perhaps it is not meant for you. Good night.
47.context: NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

24.speaker: Player
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taller players step forward, guiding Shadowheart into a kill by the shoulders.

38.speaker: Player
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taller players step forward, guiding Shadowheart into a kill by the shoulders.

9.speaker: Shadowheart
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taller players step forward, guiding Shadowheart into a kill by the shoulders.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps back from the kiss, delivers her line, then pushes the player to the ground, she kneels, straddling the player. She kisses forcefully.NodeContext: Spoken mid-kiss

26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shorter race players take Shadowheart by the hand, guiding her into a kiss.

16.speaker: Shadowheart
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls back from the kneeling kiss, delivers her line, then places a hand on the player's chest, shifting her weight and forcing the player to the ground. She strattles them and kisses, forcefully.NodeContext: Spoken mid-kiss

13.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
13.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Cut to the desecrated idol, and exit the scene.

10.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
10.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart leans back, Shadowheart crosses her arms, reaching down to her belt line to pull her tunic up.

The player looks up as Shadowheart pantomimes undressing offscreen.

18.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
18.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart leans back, Shadowheart crosses her arms, reaching down to her belt line to pull her tunic up.

The player looks up as Shadowheart pantomimes undressing offscreen.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.
15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart topless and still strattling the player, puts her hand on the player's chest, delivers the first half her line, then rolls to a strattling position on top of her--then delivers the second half of her line.

The player reaches down to their own belt line to remove their tunic.

Cut to Shadowheart as she watches the player undress.

Shadowheart pulls the player's head down to her own.NodeContext: Slightly breathless, barely contained.

42.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Further explicit content can be added before this node.

The statue of Selûne looms over them, covered in the blood of Nightsong...

32.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

12.speaker: Shadowheart
12.text: Go, then. Maybe you can do better by yourself, though I doubt it.

37.speaker: Player
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Of course. I'm clearly better at wickedness than you are.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

7.speaker: Player
7.text: A little healthy competition. Nothing to fear.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: I'm not afraid. Far from it.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Selûne will forgive me. I did what I had to, for the sake of our partnership.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

30.speaker: Shadowheart
30.text: Indeed? And what else might you be willing to do...?
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

27.speaker: Player
27.text: So what shall we be doing? Theft? Arson? Murder? Foul language?

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: Fine suggestions, all. Perhaps another time.

20.speaker: Shadowheart
20.text: Go, then. Lady Shar's blessings can be for me alone.
